pledge.core

Class ModelPLEDGE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pledge.core.ModelPLEDGE

  • public class ModelPLEDGE
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents the model of the application. It contains the methods to perform the business logic of the application: load a feature model, perform the products' prioritization, etc.
